alert.note: Alert for Pinal (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 15 at 1:39PM MST until October 15 at 2:30PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM MST FOR MARICOPA AND PINAL COUNTIES... At 139 PM MST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Phoenix to near Tolleson to 7 miles south of Estrella Mountain Park, moving northwest at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Peoria, Surprise, Avondale, Goodyear, Buckeye, El Mirage, Tolleson, Youngtown, Sun City West, Waddell, Laveen, Cashion and Sun City. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 115 and 152. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 195 and 210. AZ Route 51 near mile marker 1. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
